title: Britney Spears’s Father Jamie Seeks to End Conservatorship Immediately
sub_head: Hearing over 13-year legal arrangement was set for Nov. 12
body:
Britney Spears’s father requested to immediately end his daughter’s conservatorship, the latest step toward ending the 13-year legal arrangement controlling the pop star’s personal life and $60 million estate.
Attorneys for James P. “Jamie” Spears, Ms. Spears’s father, said in a filing submitted to the Los Angeles Court Superior Court on Monday that Mr. Spears sought to end the conservatorship immediately and believed the legal arrangement was no longer needed more than a dozen years after he took the helm of her conservatorship.
